instructor.name: Oscar Castellino
instructor.bio: Oscar Castellino is a performer at the highest levels of theatre and has over 20 years experience on the social dance floor. His Rogue style evolved by bringing his stage experience as a performer onto the dance floor, combining the best of both worlds into the Rogue style.

principles.name: Rogue Body, Bond, Beyond
principles.description: Ground in yourself, listen to your partner, expand into the space

principles.name: Rogue Legato
principles.description: Your center of gravity travels on a continuous, unbroken path

principles.name: Rogue Pause, Presence, Pivot
principles.description: Stop the movement, find each other, then redirect together

principles.name: Rogue Bounce and Roll
principles.description: When bodies meet, rebound elastically or redirect

principles.name: Rogue Humility
principles.description: Surrender your movement when connection is lost; seek the partner before continuing

principles.name: Rogue Lazy
principles.description: Relaxed and lazy, yet in time—a paradox found in both music and dance

upcomingEvents.description: Join Oscar Castellino for an immersive Rogue Bachata workshop at Create Destroy Studios. This session will explore the core principles of Rogue Resonance—groundedness, flow, and authentic connection. Suitable for all levels.

pastEvents.venue: Our Lady of Hal RC Church
pastEvents.address: 165 Arlington Rd, London NW1 7EX (near Camden Town tube station)
pastEvents.description: The inaugural Rogue Resonance workshop. Participants explored the core principles: Bounce and Roll, Stop and Connect, Groundedness, Flow, and Connection. A welcoming container for all experience levels with tea, coffee, and great music.
